msg: add xml preamble on smtpserver-template configuration file

author: gjm
msg: dashboard: Attribute urn rather than type for widget/layout names

author: elecharny
msg: - the indexed AT are now listed usig their OIDs (otherwise, the created index are deleted immediately after having been created). Fixes for DIRSERVER-1712

- the index creation is now faster, as we don't iterate over the indexes, browsing the full MasterTable for each index to create. We now do the opposite : we browse the MasterTable only once and update all the index in one shot. Fixes for DIRSERVER-1711
